name: Fnf but PICO! (read about first)
description:
WARNING THING

This mod is trash okay? custom songs might come soon but for now. He's stuck with the bf's voice. This mod is just a terrible reskin but I think its cool. Especially when its my first mod. It is easy just to make this for your self but I just wanted to post this and kinda help people so they don't have to change every asset and they can just download this. And i thought it would be cool to make a story with it. The story can be found in the paragraph below. 

After Pico's defeat when XML. Boyfriend came into town, he's been quite pissed. Thus the adventures of XML. shall now be rewritten by Pico. Will he acomplish it? Tbh idek. Oh yeah girlfriend's comin' too.

Password is: GOPICO

Update things or something

19/6/21 - Hey its out and nobody knows.

still, 19/6/21 - *sniff* *sniff* Is that a week 2 update I smell?

Psst! Here's a download secret! Using winrar is one of the best ways to download any of my projects! its efficient and easy to use!
